channel.title: jira.namics.com
channel.description: An XML representation of a search request

item.title: [DISTRELEC-5504] new legal text on the German website
item.description:
Since our team can't change the small legal text on the bottom of the homepage we need to ask you for it.

Initial situation:
On the prod. environment we still use the Swiss legal text:
© 2014 Distrelec, Zweigniederlassung der Dätwyler Schweiz AG. Alle Rechte vorbehalten.

Change request:
Please change the text to:
DE: © 2014 Distrelec Schuricht GmbH. Alle Rechte vorbehalten.
EN: © 2014 Distrelec Schuricht GmbH. All rights reserved.

Screenshot attached
item.summary: new legal text on the German website

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
Hi Florian
This ticket is quite urgent for the new German webshop and prob. easy to do for you.
Thx, Sarah
Should this be changed via properties? or do we change it better directly?
Should be part of next version

item.title: [DISTRELEC-5493] Button to close
item.description: The Button for closing all accordions is to close

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: Please test after the next deployment

item.title: [DISTRELEC-5492] FF - 404 if searched for specific product
item.description:
Issue
If you search for item 776095 in the CH shop you get to a 404.
Problem is the URL:
https://test.distrelec.ch/de/Microcontroller-Board%2C-Due-A000062-Atmel-SAM3X8E-ARM-Cortex-M3-CPU-54-Arduino-A000062/p/11038918?replacementFor=11056417/?q=11056417

Working URL: (At the end the "?"-sign has been replaced in the url-bar with an "&"-sign to make it work.)
https://test.distrelec.ch/de/Microcontroller-Board%2C-Due-A000062-Atmel-SAM3X8E-ARM-Cortex-M3-CPU-54-Arduino-A000062/p/11038918?replacementFor=11056417&q=11056417
item.summary: FF - 404 if searched for specific product

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-5481] Invalid vouchers shown @cart-caluclation
item.description:
Issue

  1. If a wrong voucher is entered, the wrong code is shown at the calculation.
  2. If a correct voucher is entered, it is added to the calculation but the warning-message still appears stating the voucher is invalid.

Requirement

  1. Invalid vouchers should not being added to the calculation.
  2. Success message should be shown if a valid voucher is entered.

Data

  • Reusable Code, Order discount 5 EUR
    vEaP8HNnbS
    VD6Hrdr86s
  • Reusable Code, Product Discount 7%
    GCOXZDEnEV Material 17620016

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: Please have a look, thanks.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-5442] Availability not loaded -> text scrambles prod detail page
item.description:
Issue
If availability can't be loaded, the warning-text scrambles prod detail page. Please fix.
item.summary: Availability not loaded -> text scrambles prod detail page

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: Issue only appears if PI-connection is broken or due to another issue which prevents getting the availability-data out of sap.

Please test after the next deployment
Thanks!

Please test after the next deployment
Thanks!

Please try again.
It works fine for me

item.title: [DISTRELEC-2194] 8.2 Events --> Refactoring needed (functional testing failing so far)
item.description:
Compare e.g.: test.distrelec.ch or http://test.distrelec.ch/de/LED-Stromversorger-60-W-Mean-Well-PLC-60-12/p/11025504

Given: 'activatedEvents' : ['add_products', 'add-cdo', 'acc-att', 'req-hbr', 'add-nsl', 'add-ltc', 'blk-afl', 'blk-acl', 'blk-asl', 'add-ltc', 'blk-rsl', 'cart', 'download', 'list', 'cart', 'compare', 'favorite', 'list', 'print', 'share', 'sup', 'fdb', 'nlt'],

--> So far no tracking-requests are transmitted (except for 'add_products') by click on the specified events (compare Spec p. 17)

  • OS: W7
  • UA: FF 25.0
item.summary: 8.2 Events --> Refactoring needed (functional testing failing so far)

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: Sieht mir eher nach FE issue aus.

Hi Dominic

  • Event 'cart' --> on product detail sites missing as second request (e.g. compare http://test.distrelec.ch/en/Windows-7-Home-Premium-ita-Vollversion-1-Microsoft-GFC-00142/p/11062288)
  • toolsitem.skin.shopping-bulk ('list'): So far not working
  • shoppinglist-add-to-cart ('add-ltc'): So far not working

Thx Mark
Info: only marks comment is still open. the issues described in the ticket are resolved.

1) Event Cart: This event is already implemented and only needs to be activated. But it is only implemented on the Toolsitem Cart Button (the icon one with the 8 corners) and not on normal Buttons. This means on the Product Detail View, a Click on "Zum Warenkorb hinzufügen..." does not trigger an 8.2 Event.

2) There was a bug which is now resolved.

3) Should already trigger an Event, see the attached Screenshot showing the two requests.
See comment, just call me if you think its easier to discuss over the phone.

4) Regarding 'Event Cart' (-> referring to 'toolsitem.skin.cart'):

--> In terms of Toolsitem Cart Button (the icon one with the 8 corners) the additional event is e.g. not triggered so far for 'Meta HD Flyout Search'

5) Generally please implement the additional event also for normal Buttons (Suche Global, Product Detail View, Meta HD Flyout Search, Compare View, BOM Manager, Shopping Lists)

6) Event 'Shopping Lists /shopping' (-> referring to 'shoppinglist-meta-actions'): So far not working

Thx Mark
4) Added 8.2 Event Tracking to Meta HD Suggest. Resolved.
6) Cannot reproduce. Was the event that maybe not activated? If the issue is still there, please describe it in more detail.

5)

Implemented:

√ Product Detail View (Buying Section)
√ Meta HD Flyout Search (Same as in 4)
√ Compare View
√ BOM Manager (Add to Cart und Add to List Buttons)

//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

Not Implemented:

  • Suche Global

Please define Tracking ID and which Button exactly should be tracked.

//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

Was already implemented:

  • Shopping Lists

Please define Tracking ID and which Button exactly should be tracked.

5) Okay (as discussed on phone: 'Suche Global' = 'Meta HD Flyout Search')

6) Event 'Shopping Lists /shopping': Event is activated and executed. However, the request is so far not poperly (aborted) transmitted. I have shortly looked into this: It seems that a pagereload is generated onclick. Question: Is 'sendunload' accordingly considered for the event?

Thx Mark
6) Okay. Which Event do you mean? "Add a new Shopping List" or "Add all Items to Cart" or another one?

6) The event 'Add a new Shopping List' is meant.

Mark

6) The problem here is the same as in another ticket: The event is fired, but not completely because of the following page load. The specification said, that sendOnUnload would make this possible, bis it does not work. As far as I know, we do not habe the possibility to track this event.

Hi Mark

Please see my latest comment. Unfortunately, I think this can not be tracked. But you could check back with your Webtrekk Contact and ask him, if he knows a solution to track something by Javascript with an immediate page load.

Please compare E-Mail dated Montag, 3. Februar 2014 09:09

Ciao Dominic

Danke für dein Feedback bezüglich DISTRELEC-2648 bzw. -2194.

Wie von dir erwähnt werde ich das gerne umgehend mit unserer Ansprechperson bei Webtrekk anschauen. Ich habe mir dazu den Quellcode (base-Js) angeschaut. Könntest du mir bitte kurz angeben, auf welche Js-Funktion sich z.B. die Klasse 'btn btn-primary' (bezieht sich auf den Fall 'req-snd') bezieht?

Ciao Mark

The best way to see this issue is in the form-feedback module. Suche dazu im File "http://www.distrelec.at/_ui/all/cache/base.js" einfach mal nach "Tc.Module.FormFeedback". Dort passiert nach einem Klick auf den Absenden Button folgendes:

1) sendForm() wird aufgerufen
2) sentFormSuccessful() wird aufgerufen
3) trackEventFormSent wird aufgerufen
3) webtrekkEvent wird gefeuert, was "onWebtrekkEvent" aufruft im Modul "Tc.Module.Webtrekk"
4) wt.sendinfo(webtrekkObj) wird aufgerufen

Diese Details musst du aus meiner Sicht aber gar nicht so genau verstehen. Wichtig wäre nur zu wissen, ob man einen Tracking Event auslösen kann, wenn danach ein PageLoad folgt. Aus meiner Sicht geht das eben nicht.

Move Implementation to on site link.

Rename onWebtrekkOnSiteLink to onWebtrekkEventWithPageLoad in webtrekk.js. Only used in newsletter subscribe so far.

Even if I put the following code directly into the HTML of the Newsletter Subscribe Button, the Request does not seem to be transmitted. You can try and add this via Firebug into the Markup on test.distrelec.at and see it for yourself.

onclick="wt.sendinfo(

{linkId:'ch.ons.test.-',sendOnUnload:1}

);"

Hi Dominic

As far as I know Webtrekk Js-functionalities need to be fully and properly initialised during page-loading. That is why a Markup-test within is not working in this regard via Firebug 'from scratch'.

A analogous working example (onclick-event Webtrekk function-call) you can find as following: https://www.distrelec.ch/home (click on promobox - compare attached screenshot).

For an according Hybris-testing please setup a 'onclick="wt.sendinfo(

{linkId:'ch.ons.test.-',sendOnUnload:1}

);"'-example on a test-environment (test-page) in order to test the Webtrekk-behaviour on the basis of a givne page-load.

Thx Mark

Hi Mark
Okay good to know, but I already tested this and I tested it now again putting the following link tag in the JSP:

<a href="https://distrelec-ch.local:9002/my-account" onclick="wt.sendinfo(

{linkId:'ch.ons.test.-',sendOnUnload:1}

);">Test</a>

I also tried the one from the current Distrelec Homepage Promo Teaser. There must be another issue. Is maybe a certain plugin not activated or included in the webtrekk v3 Javascript file?

Hi Dominic

I have created an according test-link on Q-environment (http://test.distrelec.ch/de//cms/Technische%20Informationen). Seems to work (compare attached screenshot)

Bests, Mark

Only visible in a traffic sniffer like fiddler.

Todo with Mark: Define affected Module and theri Link ID, see https://wiki.namics.com/display/distrelint/Webtrekk+-+Frontend+Implementation "Events with Page Loads (ehemals Onsite Links)"

See Table "Events with Page Loads (ehemals Onsite Links)", I added every Module thats needs this.

+ Add ID, check that it is a "WithPageLoad" Event
+ Check via Fiddler Sniffer if Values are transmitted
All "Events Link Tags mit name Attribut on Page Load" Impelmented and Tested with Traffic Sniffer.

Hi Dominic

The fix-version v0.5. is noted. Howevere this must have been deployed later on. Is that checked-in respectively foreseen for deployment (FYI: not contained in the 1.1.6 Q-deployment according to release notes)?

Thx Mark

Hi Mark

This is already deployed on http://test.distrelec.at

Hi Dominic

Testing done on test.distrelec.at respectively last item on test.distrelec.ch:

  • sup: WT-request not transmitted in Chrome (thinkable reason: name-attribute before href-tag -> compare attached screenshot) / please submit 'sup-sup' in this case (as specified in the WT-Spec)
  • fdb: WT-request not transmitted in Chrome (thinkable reason: name-attribute before href-tag -> compare attached screenshot) / please submit 'fdb-fdb' in this case (as specified in the WT-Spec)
  • fdb-snd: Could not test that successfully. Please verify.
  • srh-snd: Could not test that successfully. Please verify.
  • spa-spa | spa-snd: Could not test successfully. Please verify (tested via http://test.distrelec.at/de/DET4TC2-%2B-KIT%2C-spieslose-Erdungspr%C3%BCfung-Megger---1000-404/p/serviceplus/90040788)
  • req-hbr | req-snd: Tested 'req-hbr' successfully. Could not test 'req-snd' successfully - please verify (http://test.distrelec.ch/de/Laborkabel-%C3%B8-4-mm-rot-100-cm-Multi-Contact-SML-100cm-red/p/14022002)

Mark

Hi Mark

I only tested the first one "sup" with my traffic sniffer and could see the request after clicking on the Button "Support". I attached a Screenshot.

Don't you see it in your Traffic Sniffer?

Regarding 'sup':

  • Seems to work with IE and FF
  • With Chrome the request seems not to be transmitted. On similar implementations (e.g. Footer-Links) it is yet working. Thereby the name-attribute is however after the href-tag. In order to get 'sup' also in Chrome to work I assume that the name-attribute needs to be placed after the href-tag.

Mark

It also already works in Chrome, but I changed the attribute order anyway.

I tested all those event IDs with my Traffic Sniffer and in my opinion they are all working.

Hi Dominic

E.g. 'fdb-snd' (to be transmitted on successful transmission of the feedback-form) I have also tested privately (no corporate traffic restrictions) on test.distrelec.at. The according request containing the ID seems not to be transmitted. Could you please attach a screenshot of the according Traffic-Sniffer request showing the request respectively the stated ID?

The support-'process' seems to be '2-step' by now. Is 'sup-snd' also implemented?

Thx Mark

1. Der Event heisst fdk-snd und nicht fdb-snd. Soll ich ihn umbenennen in fdb-snd? The event is sent locally on my machine but not on test.distrelec.ch. I am investigating the issue...

2. Support Process is implemented as one step. I will add the second step. Which ID should be used?

Hi Dominic

1. Sorry my mistake (mistyping) -> fdk-snd is correct

2. ID. sup-snd

Thx Mark

Hi Mark

1) Ok

2) Ok, I added this event.

I investigated why you could not see every event on test.distrelec.at. You have to add these events to the list of activated events via HMC. I added fdk-snd and sup-snd to test.distrelec.at and now you should be able to see those too. I attached you a Screenshot.

Ticket resolved.

Hi Dominic

I have tested the implementation on test.distrelec.at. Some findings:

  • Support 1st step: Current: sup -> Required: sup-sup
  • Support 2nd step (http://test.distrelec.at/de/Support/cms/support): Request containing 'sup-snd' is not transmitted on successful form-transmission.
  • Feedback 1st step: Current: fdb -> Required: fdb-fdb
  • Feedback 2nd step (http://test.distrelec.at/de/Feedback/cms/feedback): Request containing 'fdb-snd' is not transmitted on successful form-transmission. Request is however transmitted if captcha is entered wrongly. To be refactored.

-> Pleae verify for all according events on test.distrelec.at and refactor accordingly.

Thx Mark

Hi Mark

Which if the issues in this ticket are still open? All in your latest comment?

Thanks!

Hi Dominic

In my view there is preliminary 'issue' (pre-condition to enable thorough testing/verification) which needs to be initially tackled in this regard: In case that new events are defined and implemented (as the once in this ticket) their id's shall automatically be added to the list of activated events by default (given also in case of redeployments). Could that be implemented given a reasonable effort?

Thx Mark

Discussed with Mark on the phnone:

check sup / sup-sup and fdb / fdb-fdb and then close this ticket. for any other issues, mark will open a new ticket.

Changed ID's as described and verified that all four are transmitted:

sup-sup and sup-snd
fdb-fdb and fdb-snd

Can be tested on test.distrelec.ch after the next deployment.

Hi Dominic

As agreed I am going to test the above indicated four events as soons as they are deployed. For the remaining events I am going to open a new ticket and assign to you.

Bests, Mark

Please deploy asap on HP-Q.

Thx Mark

Mark, this is deployed.
If it works please set the ticket to "closed".
Thanks

Hi Dominic

I have just tested sup-sup and sup-snd respectively fdb-fdb and fdb-snd on test.distrelec.ch (I have added the according event-id's via hmc).

sup-sup, sup-snd and fdb-fdb are transmitted.

So far I cannot reproduce a Webtrekk-request for fdb-snd

To note the implementation for sup-snd and fdb-snd seems to be different:

  • sup-snd: <button class="btn btn-primary" type="submit" data-webtrekk-linkid="ch.ons.sup-snd.-"><i></i>Senden</button>
  • fdb-snd: <button type="submit" name="submit" data-webtrekk-linkid="ch.ons.fdb-snd.-" class="btn btn-primary">Feedback senden<i></i></button>

Please verify and refactor.

Thx Mark
Assigning to Florian, as Dominic is not on the project anymore.

Hi Ruben

I have integrated DISTRELEC-3796 as a subtask of this ticket. Analogous to the teaser-tracking I have put together an overview (compare attached .xls-file) regarding refactoring of the Event-tracking.

All Events that need refactoring are indicated in column A in red. To note respectively to consider always: All Events should only be triggered if listed as 'activated' ID's in the Webtrekk-pixel of the according webpage.

For the Events on row 29 & 31 I would require (test-) links to verify the status of the current implementation as well as to verify further implementations (I have sent an according request to Florian via e-mail).

There is a new, additional Event (compare row 40): For any click on a 'Live Support'-button an Event tracking-request shall be triggered via event-handler as following (implementation-example for the CH-webshop):

"onclick=wt.sendinfo(

{linkId:'ch.ons.lct-lct.-'}

);"

Please estimate the required effort for that. As mentioned it may be a good idea to align shortly with Dominic in this regard before start refactoring.

Thx Mark

We are trying to trigger the webtrekk tracking call when clicking on the Live Chat link. This link is generated by Vivocha, and injected into our give-us-feedback module.

So at the end we have this link.

<a class="btn" data-webtrekk-linkid="de.ons.lct-lct.-">

But it does not trigger the webtrekk call. It looks that Webtrekk is not working for elements created by DOM manipulation

Please test after the next deployment
Thanks!

Tested and verified today (v3.0.m26).

The event-tracking of the buttons support/'live chat' respectively feedback is remaining. In this regard please compare the lines 34-37 & 40 in the attached .xls-overview.

Seems not to be fixed by now. Please verify and refactor accordingly.

Thx Mark

Please test after the next deployment.
NOTE: Live Chat button tracking should be currenty available on
test.distrelec.de

Tested and verified today on test.distrelec.de (v3.0.m28). -> DONE

Regarding 'live chat': Verified and tested successfully. As discussed please ensure with BE that the event is triggered properly upon a LIVE-deployment.

Thx Mark

item.title: [DISTRELEC-5513] Create index on table DistPunchOutFilter
item.description:
Statement like these to be optimized.

141022-21:39:53:809|24 ms|statement|SELECT  item_t0.PK  FROM distpunchoutfilter item_t0 WHERE (( item_t0.p_product  IN (?) OR  item_t0.p_producthierarchy  IN (?)) AND  item_t0.p_salesorg =(?) AND  item_t0.p_validfromdate <=(?) AND  item_t0.p_validuntildate >=(?) AND  item_t0.p_country  IN (?,?)) AND (item_t0.TypePkString=? )|SELECT  item_t0.PK  FROM distpunchoutfilter item_t0 WHERE (( item_t0.p_product  IN (8800262717441) OR  item_t0.p_producthierarchy  IN ('155200')) AND  item_t0.p_salesorg =(8796094650841) AND  item_t0.p_validfromdate <=('2014-10-22 00:00:00.0') AND  item_t0.p_validuntildate >=('2014-10-22 00:00:00.0') AND  item_t0.p_country  IN (8796094464034,8796097249314)) AND (item_t0.TypePkString=8796128510034 )
141022-21:39:53:832|22 ms|statement|SELECT  item_t0.PK  FROM distpunchoutfilter item_t0 WHERE (( item_t0.p_product  IN (?) OR  item_t0.p_producthierarchy  IN (?)) AND  item_t0.p_validfromdate <=(?) AND  item_t0.p_validuntildate >=(?) AND  item_t0.p_customertype =(?)) AND (item_t0.TypePkString=? )|SELECT  item_t0.PK  FROM distpunchoutfilter item_t0 WHERE (( item_t0.p_product  IN (8800262717441) OR  item_t0.p_producthierarchy  IN ('155200')) AND  item_t0.p_validfromdate <=('2014-10-22 00:00:00.0') AND  item_t0.p_validuntildate >=('2014-10-22 00:00:00.0') AND  item_t0.p_customertype =(8796107538523)) AND (item_t0.TypePkString=8796128477266 )

I created a temporarily index (for attribute P_PRODUCTHIERARCHY) on the production DB that reduced execution time to 1ms.
see DISTRELEC-5076

=> ToDo: Temporarily index to be removed after next deployment. Write post installation instruction.

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-5496] DEV DNS Modification
item.description:
Could you please modify the configuration for the dev.distrelec.xx.distrelec.com domains to dev.distrelec-xx.distrelec.com:

Please change it in distrelecB2Bcore\resources\distrelecB2Bcore\import\essential\stores\distrelec_AT\site.impex and in the Apache config.

  • dev.distrelec.ch.distrelec.com --> dev.distrelec-ch.distrelec.com
  • dev.distrelec.de.distrelec.com --> dev.distrelec-de.distrelec.com
  • dev.distrelec.at.distrelec.com --> dev.distrelec-at.distrelec.com
  • dev.distrelec.it.distrelec.com --> dev.distrelec-it.distrelec.com
  • dev.distrelec.lt.distrelec.com --> dev.distrelec-lt.distrelec.com
  • dev.distrelec.dk.distrelec.com --> dev.distrelec-dk.distrelec.com
  • dev.distrelec.se.distrelec.com --> dev.distrelec-se.distrelec.com
  • dev.distrelec.no.distrelec.com --> dev.distrelec-no.distrelec.com

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: @Florian: Please change the Dev DNS now

item.description:

Please change it in distrelecB2Bcore\resources\distrelecB2Bcore\import\essential\stores\distrelec_AT\site.impex and in the Apache config.

  • prod.distrelec.ch.distrelec.com --> prod.distrelec-ch.distrelec.com

  • prod.distrelec.se.distrelec.com --> prod.distrelec-se.distrelec.com

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

ex.: dev.distrelec.ch.distrelec.com --> dev.distrelec-ch.distrelec.com
https://jira.namics.com/browse/DISTRELEC-5496

item.title: [DISTRELEC-5469] Search Result Page // Title redesign
item.description:
Please change the title area on the search result page as followed:

  • Remove <H1> title
  • Resize the gap between breadcrump and FF campaigns to 30 px
  • Resize the gap between FF campaigns and number of search results to 30 px
  • Change the number of search result phrase from
    • [Number] products found "to" [Number] products found for [Searchkeyword]
    • [Number] products found - including [Number] from our Special Procurement Assortment "to" [Number] Products found - including [Number] from our Special Procurement Assortment for [Searchkeyword]

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Please test after the next deployment.

NOTE that some strings have been changed, so they must be translated again.
Could you please define the keyword with the color red as in the mockup?
Please clean the cache. Works fine for me (see attachment)

item.title: [DISTRELEC-5396] LT // BOM list not importable when just pasted into field
item.description:
Mac OS X 10.9.5
Safari 7.1

user distrelec.testing+lt2@gmail.com, pw distrelec

https://test.distrelec.lt/import-tool

When pasting directly an article list into the import field then the continue button will not be activated, first it have to be clicked into the import field, this will activate the button, this circumstance confuses people like me (= efficiency customer).
item.summary: LT // BOM list not importable when just pasted into field

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Tested today in the Mac and everything fine.
Probably a temporary issue, or cache.
Please check with me it is not solved yet.
Please re-test after the next deployment

item.title: [DISTRELEC-5366] Wrong design of drop down menu
item.description:
Mac OS X 10.9.5
Safari 7.1

https://test.distrelec.de/checkout/address?editmode=true&addressid=8829844258839

On checkout page step 1, change the billing address, drop down menu for country and "Bundesland" are not displayed in the same manner, this in Safari and other browsers as well.
item.summary: Wrong design of drop down menu

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Please test after the next deployment.
Thanks!

item.title: [DISTRELEC-5361] iFrame Component // Add Scrollbar
item.description:
Please add a scrollbar to the iframe CMS component if the content is higher than the defined parameters.

Never show a scroll bar for the width.

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Hi Florian,

could you give me some examples ? Links ?

thx
http://test.distrelec.ch/de/MobileStore/cms/MobileStore

Hi,

It seems that the problem occurs only with Chrome browser. I tried with Firefox and IE and it works fine.
It seems that the problem occurs only with WebKit engines (Chrome & Safari). We tried to use the same iframe in an empty page and we got the scroll bars.

Attribute scrolling="yes" added to the iframe.
Waiting for the next deployment to test.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-5348] Test DE // a product that appears Active in SAP, when searched, produces 404
item.description:
user is loged in (even it there is a punch out for this customer, Error 404 should not be shown)

distrelec.testing+ade15@gmail.com

searched for: 11044777

this is the URL of the search: https://test.distrelec.de/de/IR-Thermometer--30-%2B500-%C2%B0C-Fluke-FLUKE-414D-62-MAX%2B-PROMO/p/11044777?q=11044777
item.summary: Test DE // a product that appears Active in SAP, when searched, produces 404

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
hi Nabil
Could you please check what the matter?

For this specific product we have a Manufacturer punchout applied. The problem is that the filter is applied only if the customer is logged in. The punchout is not applied for anonymous customers.

What is the expected behavior in both cases anonymous and authenticated customers? Should the punchout filter applies for both or only for authenticated?
fixed

item.title: [DISTRELEC-5296] Activate * searches in FF backend
item.description:
In order to use FF to its fullest, it is necessary that we can perform searches with * (resp. trigger all searchable products in one product set). Today, we cannot and only get a zero result.

Please change the setup so that we can use the * internally.

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: @Daniela: I think that this will not be possible, because we try to strictly avoid searches with just a *. There needs to be at least one filter selected. But I can ask Mr. Türk if we can disable this filtering for the backend.
It needs to be. We really need the * search to implement campaigns with advanced filtering of the product sets. So I hope Mr. Türk can use his wizardry...
Waiting on response from Mr. Türk

item.title: [DISTRELEC-5489] SEO - URL Migration Issues - Https major issue
item.description:
Observations :

  • Friday 17/10/14 a hidden deployment of the https over the entire hybris platform have been implemented on production environment.

Impacts :

  • As it's been done, this implementation of https for SEO is the equivalent of the full duplication of the website.

Demands :

Block crawler access to the http website :

  • Replace this faulty meta tag : 
    <meta name="robots" content="no-index,follow"/>

    (this code doesn't work https://developers.google.com/webmasters/control-crawl-index/docs/robots_meta_tag)
    with this one :

    <meta name="robots" content="noindex, nofollow, noarchive">

    on every https url.

  • The https://www.distrelec.XX/robots.txt content must be replaced by this content : 
    User-agent: *
Disallow:/

    (don't modifiy the http://www.distrelec.XX/robots.txt)

  • This issue must be fixed before friday 24/10/2014

Checking process :

  • This issue can't be closed without my final live check.
  • Thank you to update the status of the implementation in the comment below.
item.summary: SEO - URL Migration Issues - Https major issue

status.description: This issue was once resolved, but the resolution was deemed incorrect. From here issues are either marked assigned or resolved.

comments.comment:
I've fixed the issue.
It must be tested very deeply and i've deployed the release on atos q system.

It could be tested using this urls:
http;//test.a.distrelec.ch
https://test.a.distrelec.ch

Thank you, but I can't reach the test server

http://test.a.distrelec.ch/ & https://test.a.distrelec.ch/
Service Temporarily Unavailable
The server is temporarily unable to service your request due to maintenance downtime or capacity problems. Please try again later.
Apache Server at test.a.distrelec.ch Port 80

Ok, atos test server are randomly responding.

After manual test, everything is working as expected on http://test.a.distrelec.ch/ & https://test.a.distrelec.ch/
@Francesco: any news ?

What is the deployment status ?
(it's not live)

Hi Pierre,
this issue will be transported with last production deploy v3.0.m28
@Florian, when this deploy is scheduled?
Ok, thx !
For information, the robots.txt & the robots tags edition is not deployed on https://test.distrelec.ch/
Not yet, it will when the v3.0,m28 will be deployed.
Please test asap, we would like to deploy this tonight.
